subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Bears’ defense, which prompted preseason questions because of the ages of its marquee players, has been terrorizing offenses, piling up turnovers and scoring touchdowns at a rate a modest offense might find impressive.
snippet: The Bears’ defense, which prompted preseason questions because of the ages of its marquee players, has been terrorizing offenses, piling up turnovers and scoring touchdowns at a rate a modest offense might find impressive.
